verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yahweh, Almighty God, God Most High, Everlasting God, Provider, Our Peace,
Our Banner, Lord of Hosts, Our Sanctifier, Our Shepherd, Our Righteousness, Majesty,
Supreme, Master, Emmanuel, Anointed One, Saviour, Lion of Judah, Light of the World,
Son of David, Son of God, King of Glory, Alpha, Omega, Lamb of God, Everlasting Father,
Father of the Poor, Holy Spirit, Jesus Christ, Our Rock, Our Shelter, Our Hiding place,
Our Fortress, Creator. Counsellor, Wisdom, Our Portion, Ancient of Days, Father of Mercies,
Ruler of the Nations, Eternal Immortal King, Word of Life, Word of God, Advocate,
Great High Priest, Bridegroom, The Resurrection, The true Vine, Spirit of Truth,
The New Wine. The Amen.
